creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
There is the note "try user 'lenya' and password 'levi'" on the login page but 
the reviewer user 'alice' and the password 'levi' are not mentioned.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: is already mentioned on that page: Now log out (File->Logout), log back in as alice (use the same password as for user lenya) and publish the current document by selecting Workflow->Publish.
